channel.title: Weird RunServer error
channel.description:
I got a run sever error. All i was doing was changing item prices, new items to shops. And i get this runserver error
[CODE]Starting testscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexxoutofbounsexception: 17 At ItemHandler.loaditemlist<itemhander.java:311> at itemhandler.<init><itemhandler.java:39> At server.main<server.java:27>[/CODE]
I hand typed that so might have miss spelling and no capitals. I did nothing in itemhandler and i dont no what server.main is :( please help some one
-Thanks

item.title: Weird RunServer error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

u changed to much in item handeler

Read full topic

item.title: Weird RunServer error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

golfer666:

Where do you change the shop prices?

Depends on your server source. You probally have a shops.cfg file that has the shops. You can change prices and items in there.

Read full topic
